Uses of Class
groBot.servlet.SecureServlet

  • Packages that use SecureServlet 
    Package Description
    groBot.servlet  
    groBot.servlet.test  

    • Uses of SecureServlet in groBot.servlet

      Subclasses of SecureServlet in groBot.servlet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddGroBotServlet
      Reads the MAC address and name of the GroBot from the HTML form, then creates a GroBot and saves it to the DataStore.
      class  ChangePasswordServlet
      Checks that the old password matches before changing the user's password.
      class  ChangeScheduleServlet
      Saves edits made by the user to an exisiting schedule.
      class  ConnectToNewBotServlet
      Changes the GroBot the user is currently connected to.
      class  DeleteAccountServlet
      Deletes a user's accoutn and associated DataStore members.
      class  DeleteScheduleServlet
      Deletes a schedule from the DataStore.
      class  EditScheduleServlet
      Sets up the HTML session for editing the schedule selected by the user.
      class  GrowNowServlet
      Updates a user and his/her GroBot's current schedule with the schedule selected by the user.
      class  NewScheduleServlet
      Creates a new custom schedule and assigns it to the user in the DataStore.
